text: Docosia is a genus of fungus gnats in the family Mycetophilidae.Kurina, O. & Sevcik, J. (2011). "Three new species of Docosia Winnertz from central and southern Europe (Diptera: Mycetophilidae)." Zootaxa 2810: 26-36. ==Selected species== * Docosia kerkini Kurina & Sevcik, 2011 * Docosia muranica Kurina & Sevcik, 2011 * Docosia rameli Kurina & Sevcik, 2011 ==References== Category:Mycetophilidae Category:Bibionomorpha genera
title: Docosia
